name: Proj_Connect
description:
※如果Chrome瀏覽器跑起來很慢的話，請到設定→進階
開啟「在可用時使用硬體加速」選項
==============================================================

你是個宇宙探險家，任務是探查銀河的各個星球找到可用的資源，然而每個星球都存在著不同的資源和風險，在燃料有限的情況下，你要如何規劃路線來取得最多的資源呢？

控制方式：
滑鼠左鍵連接星球／右鍵拖曳旋轉視角／滾輪縮放
完成路線規劃之後，按[Go]出發結算分數／按[Clear]重設路線

註：這只是單人花三天做的簡單小遊戲原型，沒有太多內容請不要期待

作者：Nori （企劃／程式／美術／音樂／音效）

使用素材及套件： Stylized Planet-Pack Full／ Quick Outline
BGM: 甘茶の音楽工房

==============================================================

You're an cosmic explorer. Your mission is to search through the galaxy to find resources usable for you. However there are also risks everywhere, and your fuel is limited. How will you plan the route to find the most resources?

Control: Mouse
Left Click to link between the planets
Right drag to turn the camera
Scroll to zoom
After finishing the route plan, click [Go] to start the trip
Click [Clear] to reset

*Note: This is a simple game prototype made by one person within 3 days, so don't expect too much on it.

Author: Nori (Game Design / Program / Art / Sound / Music)

Assets Used: 
Stylized Planet-Pack Full / Quick Outline
BGM: 甘茶の音楽工房
